titles.title: THINK TWICE Act of 2025
THINK TWICE Act of 2025
Tracking Hostile Industry Networks and Kit while Thwarting Weapons Imports from Chinese Entities Act of 2025
A bill to require a report of, and a strategy to combat, arms sales of the Government of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
